Crypto Asset Tracker - Real-Time Portfolio Monitoring

Stay on top of your cryptocurrency investments with Crypto Asset Tracker, a powerful and easy-to-use Chrome extension that tracks your digital assets in real-time. 

Key Features:
✔️ Customizable Portfolio: Add up to 5 cryptocurrencies of your choice. No predefined limits—track any coin listed on CoinGecko!
✔️ Real-Time Market Data: Get live USD values with real-time updates from the CoinGecko API.
✔️ Total Asset Calculation: Instantly see your portfolio’s total value based on current market prices.
✔️ User-Defined Balances: Set predefined balances of 1 or adjust them anytime.
✔️ Clean & Intuitive Interface: Manage your portfolio with a user-friendly interface.
✔️ Pull Down Menu from your Toolbar to track your assets easily.
✔️ One-Time Welcome Page: Get started easily with clear instructions after installation.

How It Works:
	1.	Open the extension by clicking the icon in the Chrome toolbar.
	2.	Enter the names and amounts of cryptocurrencies you want to track.
	3.	Click Save to see real-time asset values and total portfolio worth.
	4.	Add more assets (up to 5) or adjust amounts whenever needed.

Why Choose Crypto Asset Tracker?
	•	Customizable Tracking: No restrictions on asset types.
	•	Live Market Data: Direct from a trusted API.
	•	Transparency First: No account creation or sensitive data collection.

Track smarter, invest better. Download Crypto Asset Tracker today!
